content: उक्षन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Large. {@--2@} Sprinkling. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} (--क्षा) [उक्ष्-कनिन् <ls>Uṇ. 1. 156</ls>] {@--1@} An ox or bull; <ls>Ku. 7. 70</ls>; (changed to उक्ष in some <ab>comp.</ab> महोक्षः, वृद्धोक्षः, &c.). {@--2@} An epithet of Soma; the Maruts; the sun and Agni. {@--3@} One of the eight chief medicaments (ऋषभौषधि).
